feed.title: OpenSign Releases
feed.subtitle: Self-hosted software releases generated by selfh.st

entry.title: New release for OpenSign: v1.0.3
entry.content:
What's Changed

  • Add pagination in reports, fix navigation in signup by @prafull-opensignlabs in https://github.com/OpenSignLabs/OpenSign/pull/141
  • Refactor Menu and Social Media Components for Improved Accessibility by @lsprr in https://github.com/OpenSignLabs/OpenSign/pull/140
  • Improve accessibility of the login form by @lsprr in https://github.com/OpenSignLabs/OpenSign/pull/147
  • Remove hardcoded pfx passphrase by @prafull-opensignlabs in https://github.com/OpenSignLabs/OpenSign/pull/145
  • Fix the Mobile Printing issue by @rishabjasrotia in https://github.com/OpenSignLabs/OpenSign/pull/143 #81

New Contributors

  • @lsprr made their first contribution in https://github.com/OpenSignLabs/OpenSign/pull/140

Full Changelog: https://github.com/OpenSignLabs/OpenSign/compare/v1.0.2...v1.0.3

entry.title: New release for OpenSign: v1.4.1
entry.content:
What's Changed

  • fix: reduce size of tooltip and adjust it's position by @prafull-opensignlabs in https://github.com/OpenSignLabs/OpenSign/pull/537
  • fix: document list sorting issue on scroll down in opensign-drive issue, disable recipient's list and field after send request by @raktima-opensignlabs in https://github.com/OpenSignLabs/OpenSign/pull/540
  • fix: disable tour message for completed document by @raktima-opensignlabs in https://github.com/OpenSignLabs/OpenSign/commit/5a25b2d8741b73795e490d0bf4ca620fc35cb646
  • fix: signature was being shown in initials pad as default value by @raktima-opensignlabs in https://github.com/OpenSignLabs/OpenSign/commit/f8ba0d357bfb0c9958b4d397e965782b8a8e29e3
  • fix: expired document message by @raktima-opensignlabs in https://github.com/OpenSignLabs/OpenSign/commit/febb50c3cd08c6cbea55124f134eb5b409eafef6
  • fix: OpenSign drive sorting typo and add relevant icons by @raktima-opensignlabs in https://github.com/OpenSignLabs/OpenSign/commit/036c9b8d4a9cb9bd20ae92bd1fe7a4f3d62e4af5

Full Changelog: https://github.com/OpenSignLabs/OpenSign/compare/v1.4.0-beta...v1.4.1-beta

entry.title: New release for OpenSign: v1.4.2
entry.content:
What's Changed

  • fix: reduce size of tooltip and adjust it's position by @prafull-opensignlabs in https://github.com/OpenSignLabs/OpenSign/commit/a06723ff3f0d19bb1a092e4c68d6aeaa059170fa
  • fix: document list sorting issue on scroll down in opensign-drive by @raktima-opensignlabs in https://github.com/OpenSignLabs/OpenSign/commit/d1e7b9a2abaac9d65874e7387e0b4741123cd391
  • fix: disable tour message for completed document by @raktima-opensignlabs in https://github.com/OpenSignLabs/OpenSign/commit/5a25b2d8741b73795e490d0bf4ca620fc35cb646
  • fix: signature image getting copied to initials by @raktima-opensignlabs in https://github.com/OpenSignLabs/OpenSign/commit/f8ba0d357bfb0c9958b4d397e965782b8a8e29e3
  • fix: show expiry date in expired document message by @raktima-opensignlabs in https://github.com/OpenSignLabs/OpenSign/commit/febb50c3cd08c6cbea55124f134eb5b409eafef6

Full Changelog: https://github.com/OpenSignLabs/OpenSign/compare/v1.4.1...v1.4.2

entry.title: New release for OpenSign: v1.5.0
entry.content:
What's Changed

  • feat: attach digital sign to completion certificate by @prafull-opensignlabs in https://github.com/OpenSignLabs/OpenSign/pull/558
  • feat: display custom app logo saved by user from console app by @raktima-opensignlabs in https://github.com/OpenSignLabs/OpenSign/pull/560
  • feat: Improved security by generating signed download links that expire after a few minutes wherever PDF files are accessed by @prafull-opensignlabs in https://github.com/OpenSignLabs/OpenSign/pull/562
  • feat: implement functionality to save and fetch usage analytics by @prafull-opensignlabs in https://github.com/OpenSignLabs/OpenSign/pull/569
  • feat: implement custom email template of request email and completion email by @raktima-opensignlabs in https://github.com/OpenSignLabs/OpenSign/pull/568
  • feat: implement share button option to share recipient's sign url after finishing a doc creation using request signature flow by @raktima-opensignlabs in https://github.com/OpenSignLabs/OpenSign/pull/581
  • feat: add company and job title in user profile for modification by @raktima-opensignlabs in https://github.com/OpenSignLabs/OpenSign/pull/583
  • feat: add tour message for template report and opensign drive by @raktima-opensignlabs in https://github.com/OpenSignLabs/OpenSign/pull/584
  • feat: send custom completion mail if available by @prafull-opensignlabs in https://github.com/OpenSignLabs/OpenSign/pull/606
  • feat: API now supports all widgets types by @prafull-opensignlabs in https://github.com/OpenSignLabs/OpenSign/pull/591
  • feat: add revoke button in inprogress report to revoke/decline document by @raktima-opensignlabs in https://github.com/OpenSignLabs/OpenSign/pull/602
  • feat : Add new 'add recipient' button in 'request signatures' flow to add new signers in document signer's list by @raktima-opensignlabs in https://github.com/OpenSignLabs/OpenSign/pull/598
  • feat: add delete button in all reports and share button in in-progess report by @prafull-opensignlabs in https://github.com/OpenSignLabs/OpenSign/pull/599
  • fix: sorting by name issue in open-sign drive by @raktima-opensignlabs in https://github.com/OpenSignLabs/OpenSign/pull/553
  • fix: Expired report had issues by @prafull-opensignlabs in https://github.com/OpenSignLabs/OpenSign/pull/554
  • fix: Expired document message appears partially before appearing fully by @prafull-opensignlabs in https://github.com/OpenSignLabs/OpenSign/pull/555
  • fix: completion certificate not generating for old completed documents by @prafull-opensignlabs in https://github.com/OpenSignLabs/OpenSign/pull/567
  • fix: change path of favicon and manifest by @prafull-opensignlabs in https://github.com/OpenSignLabs/OpenSign/pull/574
  • fix: opensign-drive and template report tour message by @raktima-opensignlabs in https://github.com/OpenSignLabs/OpenSign/pull/609
  • fix : logo issue in guest login flow by @raktima-opensignlabs in https://github.com/OpenSignLabs/OpenSign/pull/613

Full Changelog: https://github.com/OpenSignLabs/OpenSign/compare/v1.4.2...v1.5.0

entry.title: New release for OpenSign: v1.5.1
entry.content:
What's Changed

  • fix: text input validation issue if user did not select any validation by @raktima-opensignlabs in https://github.com/OpenSignLabs/OpenSign/pull/621
  • fix: text input validation issue in template flow by @raktima-opensignlabs in https://github.com/OpenSignLabs/OpenSign/pull/624

Full Changelog: https://github.com/OpenSignLabs/OpenSign/compare/v1.5.0...v1.5.1
